title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of 2023) shall come into operation:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Historic and Archaeological Heritage and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Historic and Archaeological Heritage and 

Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited historic archaeological heritage miscellaneous provision act 2023 (commencement) order 2025

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of 2023) shall come into operation:
heading: 2. The 24th day of March 2025 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 24th day of March 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Historic and Archaeological Heritage and 
Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of 2023) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

(e) 

(f) 

(g) 

(h) 

(i) 

section 173; 

subsections (1) and (2) of section 175 insofar as they apply to 
section 138(2); 

subsections (3) and (4) of section 175 insofar as they apply to 
sections 147 and 173; 

subsections (5) and (6) of section 175 insofar as they apply to 
sections 139(1), (2) and (3), 142(1) and (2) and 204(2)(b), (3)(b) 
and (4)(b); 

subsections (7) and (8) of section 175 insofar as they apply to 
section 217(2); 

sections 183 and 184; 

section 205; 

section 208; 

Schedule 7. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 March, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th March, 2025.
